00010 #include "CTextBox.h"
00011 #include "../graphics/CGfxEngine.h"
00012 #include "../sdl/CVideoDriver.h"
00013 #include "../sdl/CTimer.h"
00014 #include "../sdl/CInput.h"
00015 
00016 CTextBox::CTextBox(int y, int h, const std::string& message) :
00017 m_tw_waittime(0)
00018 {
00019  setup(y, h, message);
00020  m_surface = g_pVideoDriver->FGLayerSurface;
00021 }
00022 
00023 CTextBox::CTextBox(SDL_Surface *surface, int y, int h, const std::string& message) :
00024 m_tw_waittime(0)
00025 {
00026  setup(y, h, message);
00027  m_surface = surface;
00028 }
00029 
00030 void CTextBox::setup(int y, int h, const std::string& message)
00031 {
00032  int width = message.length()*8;
00033  if(width>280) width = 280;
00034  m_border = false; m_numchars = 0;
00035  m_timer = 0;
00036  m_rect.w = width+2; m_rect.h = h;
00037  m_rect.x = (300/2)-(m_rect.w/2)-2; m_rect.y = y;
00038  m_String = message;
00039  m_textdelay = 0;
00040  g_pInput->flushAll();
00041  resetTimer();
00042 }
00043 
00044 void CTextBox::resetTimer()
00045 {
00046  m_time_start = g_pTimer->getTicks();
00047  m_time_passed = 0;
00048 }
00049 
00050 void CTextBox::setAttribs(Uint8 tw_waittime, bool highlight )
00051 {
00052  m_tw_waittime = tw_waittime;
00053  m_highlighted = highlight;
00054 }
00055 
00056 void CTextBox::process()
00057 {
00058  m_time_passed = g_pTimer->getTicks() - m_time_start;
00059  CFont &Font = g_pGfxEngine->getFont(0);
00060 
00061  if(m_border) SDL_FillRect(m_surface, &m_rect, SDL_MapRGB(m_surface->format, 0,0,0));
00062  if( m_tw_waittime == 0) // means no typewritting mode!
00063  {
00064   Font.drawFont(m_surface, m_String, m_rect.x+1, m_rect.y+1, m_highlighted);
00065  }
00066  else
00067  {
00068   std::string text;
00069   if( m_timer>=m_tw_waittime && m_numchars < m_String.size() )
00070   {
00071    m_numchars++;
00072    m_timer = 0;
00073   } else m_timer++;
00074 
00075   text = m_String.substr(0, m_numchars);
00076   Font.drawFont(m_surface, text, m_rect.x+1, m_rect.y+1, m_highlighted);
00077 
00078   // Process Input here!
00079   if( g_pInput->getPressedCommand(IC_STATUS) || g_pInput->getPressedCommand(IC_JUMP) )
00080   {
00081    if(m_numchars != m_String.size())
00082     m_numchars = m_String.size();
00083    else
00084     m_textdelay = m_time_passed;
00085   }
00086  }
00087 }
00088 
00089 bool CTextBox::hasFinished()
00090 {
00091  if( m_time_passed >= m_textdelay && m_tw_waittime!=0  ) return true;
00092 
00093  if( m_tw_waittime==0 && g_pInput->getPressedAnyCommand() ) return true;
00094 
00095  return false;
00096 }
